dimensions: Warp x Weft: 52.1 x 50.8 cm (20 1/2 in. x 20 in.)
title: Cope hood
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vives y Escudero
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: 4&1 satin damask patterned by discontinuous supplementary wefts (brocaded damask)
description: Three vertical repeats of an elaborately curving metallic vine with chinoiserie elements. Brocade is in gold, silver and light blue. The cope hood is in the opposite direction from the direction of the pattern.
name: Cope hood
